Template tags¶

Html rendering template tags for generic purposes.

utilities.templatetags.commontags.get_item(dictionary, key)¶

Django template tag to get value for a key in a dictionary.

Parameters:
  • dictionary – Dictionary object
  • key – Key to lookup
Returns:

Value for the key. None if key is not found.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

utilities.templatetags.commontags.get_python_type(obj, format_type)¶

Returns python type of the object. :param obj: Object :param format_type: None- Python class, ‘name’- string name :return: Python type

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

utilities.templatetags.commontags.get_user_readable(user_id, display_format)¶

Django templatetag that converts user id into readable user name.

Parameters:
  • user_id – django.contrib.auth.models.User instance id
  • display_format – Display format: *, username, full_name, first_name
Returns:

Display string

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

utilities.templatetags.commontags.has_permission(perm_json, perm_key)¶

Method to tell if perm_json has permission or not. This method uses accounts.utils.lookup_permission() method.

Parameters:
  • perm_json – Permission JSON
  • perm_key – . separated permission key of format <app-label>.<model-name>.<perm-codename>
Returns:

True if json has permission else false

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

utilities.templatetags.commontags.jsonify(obj, encoding=True)¶

Django template filter to obtain json string.

Parameters:obj – JSON object
Returns:JSON string

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

utilities.templatetags.commontags.multiply(value, multiplier)¶

Returns multiplication value and multiplier. :param value: Value :param multiplier: None- Python class, ‘name’- string name :return: value*multiplier

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

utilities.templatetags.commontags.range_loop(max_val, step=1)¶

Method to return integer loop range from 1 to given max value.

Parameters:
  • max_val – Range max value (including)
  • step – (Default: 1) Steps for looping
Returns:

range(1, max_value+step, step)
